themes: undervaluation and underfunding of street art
marginalization of talented artists and musicians
impact of social and community biases on artist recognition
vilification of artists due to irrelevant circumstances
disconnect between how marginalized experiences are treated in different platforms
key_phrases: street art in Austin...is grossly underrated underrepresented and under-funded
rich culture of artists of types as well as musicians who are incredibly talented and highly skilled yet are let to be unknown and unappreciated
vilified due to circumstances that shouldn't have relevance to the talent and art being made
from a marginalized viewpoint of an artists personal experience in life, which in other platforms we reward
barriers_identified: underrating and underfunding of street art
social and community biases against artists
vilification of artists due to irrelevant personal circumstances
lack of recognition for marginalized artists
